vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θεᾱτρ-ίζω,
to be or play on the stage, [Refs]
__II passive, to be made a show of, held up to shame, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to publicly expose
to be exposed as in a theater, to be made a gazing-stock, object of scorn, public contempt Heb. 10:33*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm trò cho thiên hạ xem; phơi bày sự khinh miệt. (Hapax)
